snippet.title: Exercise Your Demons! (2024) | Official Release Date Announcement Trailer | Meta Quest
snippet.description:
Let’s get PUMPED! Unleash your inner beast and battle back hordes of demons and beads of sweat in Exercise Your Demons! With the finest fitness trainers from the Infernal Gymnasium guiding your every move, you’ll throw down in your living room to save the world from an untimely demonic demise!

Wishlist now on Quest! https://vr.meta.me/s/251S3cbe9rwVMcg
Join the Infernal Gymnasium today! 🏋️

----

Single Player Workouts
Get your swole on as you battle through the netherworld. Clash with the Doomer Army across 9 distinct stages designed to push you to your limits as you Punch, Duck, and Dodge!


Trainer Huddles
Forge unbreakable bonds with your demonic trainers. They’ll motivate you, challenge you, and keep you coming back for more with their unique storylines and devilish hijinks!


Competitive Leaderboards
Compete against your friends and rivals in fierce leaderboard battles to climb the ranks and claim your seat on the throne as the ultimate gym warrior.


Unlock New Equipment
Collect the latest cutting edge equipment from the netherworld and crush the opposition in style.

Coming to Meta Quest devices on Dec 12!


Learn more at https://www.vyersoft.com/eyd 😈

#VirtualReality #MixedReality #MetaQuest #Fitness #Quest2 #Quest3 #Quest3s
